physical_examinations.relevant_findings: A firm, mobile 2cm left-sided thyroid nodule palpated; no palpable cervical lymphadenopathy.
Histopathology confirmed a 2.6 x 2.0 x 1.2 cm medullary thyroid carcinoma; calcitonin strongly and diffusely immunostained.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, serum calcitonin remained undetectable, CEA within reference range, and procalcitonin became undetectable.
